info.task: navigate forwards to expanded disclosure button
info.title: Navigate forwards to an expanded disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeAndExpandFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button, and sets the state of the first button to expanded

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the expanded state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the expanded state.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (expanded) is conveyed
